data.name: TAGLINE
data.detailed_description:
Join Us on Discord!


About the Game




The A.V.A.F (anti-vandal-attack-force) has plans to clean up this city once and for all by wiping away the graffiti that populates its streets. This municipal force won't hesitate to flush out the filth along with your new crew. It's time to take the fight to them.


TAGLINE is a lightning fast graffiti-based shooter with a unique weapon swapping mechanic: Switch powers on the fly by snatching street art off the walls of a funky-futurist metropolis!


Help a cast of hand animated characters fight back against the A.V.A.F by taking on missions across open level city districts. Use the old train routes to move around this loud, wild world as you upgrade your skills. Compete in an assortment of score based challenges ranging from high speed races to basketball shootouts!

  • A retro FPS with a new style: Funky 2D animations and particles clash with an oppressive 3D world, while unique mechanics and fluid movement bring a fresh feel to the genre.
  • No nonsense gameplay: Quick switch powers on the fly without worrying about ammo, simple controls mean TAGLINE is easy to learn and difficult to master!
  • The Sky is the Limit: Progress through a handcrafted world featuring open playgrounds, each with their own missions and secrets to discover!
  • 5 versatile skills: Ride explosions, create platforms, and dash through the air with 5 upgradable attacks that double as movement abilities.
  • Fill your black book: Hunt down 100+ unique graffiti designs and chronicle the history of the TAGGERS, a group of street artists lost to time.

data.short_description: TAGLINE is a lightning fast, graffiti based shooter set in a loud, wild world sprinkled with street art, hip-hop, and towering skyscrapers. Parkour and snatch the tags off the walls of this funky metropolis, and overcome an array of enemies and challenges!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer (64-bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760, Radeon R7 270X, or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad compatable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
